scripts.ssldevloc: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=true&&set NODE_ENV=development&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=localhost&&npm start
scripts.ssldevvps: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=true&&set NODE_ENV=development&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=vps&&npm start
scripts.sslprod: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=true&&set NODE_ENV=production&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=vps&&npm start
scripts.nossldevloc: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=false&&set NODE_ENV=development&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=localhost&&npm start
scripts.nossldevvps: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=false&&set NODE_ENV=development&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=vps&&npm start
scripts.nosslprod: set NODE_PATH=&&set HTTPS=false&&set NODE_ENV=production&&set REACT_APP_SERVERTARGET=vps&&npm start
